title: What are the current 7 wonders of the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: The "NEW" Seven wonders of the world e - In the order that I saw Them:1.- Taj Mahal - India2.- Great Wall - China3.- Coliseum - Rome Italy4.- Chicha Nitza - Cancun Mexico5.- Petra - Jordan - Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade filmed here. Also in Jordan Wadi Rum where Lawrence of Arabia did his thing and was also filmed here plus the Dead Sea. Jordan is a wonderful modern country that still has nomadic tribes.6.- Machu Picchu - Peru7.- Christ the Redeemer Statue - Rio de Janeiro Brazil.Along the way I also saw the LAST of the original Seven - Great Sphinx and Pyramids. - Cairo Egypt.Also Eiffel Tower Paris FranceAnd most recently back to Cairo because the city is Fantastic then just for fun Casablanca and Marrakech - Morocco. Went to Cairo after the attack in church on Palm Sunday - Notice - after my "Visit" there has been no more violence here. And that is all that I can say.
